messages.message:
@danny.lan another ping on this question (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1736803797330979?thread_ts=1736792389.091329&cid=CSY11CK7T)

Also, we merged the fix yesterday. Can you confirm the Cypress test is passing now on aihub-sandbox?

It started failing the run after the PR was merged, the evening of the 6th

Can confirm that the test is passing on aihub-sandbox now!
I meant, why was the failure not flagged starting 7th? that is Tuesday, and would have given us a few days to fix before the prod deploy over the weekend.
I thought cypress test failures blocked PR merges, so wouldn't people have noticed this failing test?

Only “relevant” cypress tests run, so if a PR doesn’t change frontend code relating to apps, the `run-app` test won’t run.

I was cypress-on-call last week but should have followed up on the failure earlier than this monday :disappointed:

Also, the Cypress test did not fail in CI runs since the app used in crafting-aihub.test.instabase.com (http://crafting-aihub.test.instabase.com) (the environment used for Cypress CI) is not old enough to run into this issue (ex: see successful run (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/16736/test-results/d363122e-2e01-4048-8cb4-cd97a10813f4?actions=%5B%5D&browsers=%5B%5D&groups=%5B%5D&isFlaky=%5B%5D&modificationDateRange=%7B%22startDate%22:%221970-01-01%22,%22endDate%22:%222038-01-19%22%7D&orderBy=EXECUTION_ORDER&oses=%5B%5D&specs=%5B%7B%22label%22:%22apps/src/aihub/__e2e__/ViewApp/run-app.spec.ts%22,%22value%22:%22%5B%5C%229b10cf50-4541-4a35-b85e-5580d0930815%5C%22,%5C%2231ffb6f2-d842-4597-a47d-a4c73e1d31c3%5C%22%5D%22%7D%5D&statuses=%5B%5D&testingTypesEnum=%5B%5D) of `run-app.spec.ts` on Liam’s PR yesterday)
So the only way we would have caught this is if someone followed up on the failures on aihub-sandbox or aihub-uat
